Text: Well, i'm going for broke here and request a few more GoG titles (which i was planning to buy in a couple of month). Can you upload any (or all) of the following? (if you have them or access to) (Note: i'm after the GoG DRM free ones not the scene ones): King's Bounty Crossworlds GOTY - Heroes Of Might  Magic V Bundle - Trine - Arcanum - Overlord + Rising Hell - Galactic Civilizations I Ultimate Edition. These are the last titles i'm looking from GoG to finish my collection (at least until new titles come out). Thank you.

Hi GOG-Upp thanks for the great games! could you please upload

The Cat Lady

http://www.gog.com/gamecard/the_cat_lady

Thanks!

Nice job with these uploads, man! I have but two requests from you, sir: the Telltale Sam & Max games (technically three requests there -- Sam & Max Save The World, Sam & Max Beyond Time and Space, Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse) and Tales of Monkey Island.

Thank you in advance, and thanks for uploading all of these fantastic games! :D
sweet man thanks! could you possibly upload total overdose.
